meta.guidance: Stay as close to the original English version as possible, except for Australian specific spelling changes. For example, favorite becomes favourite, and references to Movies and Shows should stay the same.

error_text_404.default: (Don't worry, it happens! Even the Force is sometimes out of alignment.)

input_prompt_mark_as_watched_date.default: When did you finish watching this? (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM)

button_label_join_trakt.default: Join trakt.tv to keep track of what you're watching

text_landing_discover.default: Movies and shows you will love and where they are streaming right now.

text_landing_track.default: Every movie, episode, and season you’ve seen, all in one place.

text_landing_share.default: Opinions, ratings, and lists that others will love to follow.

text_about_placeholder_1.default: This user is a mystery, shrouded in enigma... (or maybe just lazy? Who knows, this is the internet.)

text_about_placeholder_2.default: Too busy watchin' stuff to write a bio. (Fair enough, we get it.)

text_about_placeholder_3.default: This user's profile is a blank canvas, a void of information... (much like my social life. sigh)

text_about_placeholder_4.default: Unravel the secrets of this user's identity... (if you dare)

text_about_placeholder_5.default: What hidden depths lie beneath this empty profile? (The truth is out there...)

text_about_placeholder_6.default: This user is a ghost in the machine, a digital phantom... (or maybe they just forgot to fill this out?)

text_about_placeholder_7.default: Help this user out! Tell them to complete their profile. (They might even reward you with a virtual high five!)

text_about_placeholder_8.default: This profile's screaming for a bit of TLC. Time to spruce it up.

text_about_placeholder_9.default: Don't be shy! Encourage this user to share their story. (Everyone has a story to tell, even if it's just about their favourite TV show.)

text_about_placeholder_10.default: This user is like a character in a David Lynch film: enigmatic, mysterious, and possibly a figment of their own imagination.

text_about_placeholder_11.default: This profile is as empty as a Blockbuster video store on a Friday night. (Remember those? Good times.)

text_about_placeholder_12.default: This user is channeling their inner Tyler Durden: rejecting consumerism and embracing the void. (Or maybe they just haven't gotten around to filling this out yet.)

text_about_placeholder_13.default: A stylized image: A funny illustration of a detective scratching their head in confusion, or a tumbleweed rolling across an empty profile page.

text_about_placeholder_14.default: An interactive element: A button that allows users to send a friendly nudge to the profile owner, encouraging them to complete their profile.

text_about_placeholder_15.default: A personalised message: If you have any information about the user (e.g., their watch history), you could use it to generate a more personalised placeholder, like 'This user loves horror movies but hates writing bios. (Maybe they're too busy hiding from zombies?)'

list_placeholder_watchlist.default: Your watchlist is empty. Add movies or shows to create your cinematic masterpiece.

list_placeholder_watchlist_movies.default: Your watchlist is empty, mate. Chuck in a few movies!

list_placeholder_watchlist_shows.default: Your watchlist is looking a bit bare, mate. Add a show worth a binge!

list_placeholder_released_movies.default: Add movies to your watchlist and never miss a premiere.

list_placeholder_unreleased_movies.default: Add upcoming movies to your watchlist and stay updated.

warning_prompt_remove_from_watched.default: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from your Watched list? All plays will be removed.

button_label_remove_from_history.default: Remove this play of {title} from your Watched list

warning_prompt_remove_single_watched.default: Are you sure you want to remove this play of {title} from your Watched list?

warning_prompt_remove_from_watchlist.default: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from your Watchlist?

warning_prompt_remove_from_favorites.default: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from your Favourites?

list_placeholder_favorite_movies.default: There are no favourite movies here.

list_placeholder_favorite_shows.default: There are no favourite shows here.

list_placeholder_popular_lists.default: {title} does not appear on any popular lists.

text_share_movie.default: Just discovered {title} - you need to see this! 🎬

tooltip_text_preview_feature.default: This feature's still getting a fresh coat of paint, citizen. We're hammering away at the UX, making it sing like a choir of angels (or at least, function smoothly without inducing existential dread).

warning_prompt_drop_show.default: Are you sure you want to drop {title} show? This will remove it from your up next list.

warning_prompt_restore_show.default: Are you sure you want to restore {title} show? This will restore it on your progress and calendar.

warning_prompt_mark_as_watched_show.default: Are you sure you want to mark {title} as watched? This will mark all episodes as watched.

warning_prompt_mark_as_watched_show_unti.default: Are you sure you want to mark all unseen episodes of {title} as watched until episode {episode}? This will mark {count} episodes as watched.

warning_prompt_mark_as_watched_multiple_.default: Are you sure you want to mark {count} episodes as watched?

translated_value_error_comment_invalid_c.default: Comments must be at least 5 words and in English.

translated_value_error_comment_unknown.default: An error occurred while posting your comment. Please try again later.

text_private_profile_description.default: As if there wasn't enough hidden already. {username}'s secrets remain their own.

error_text_service_unavailable.default: The connection is... absent. Like a forgotten memory.

warning_prompt_remove_from_personal_list.default: Are you sure you want to remove {title} from {list}?

header_device_auth_try_again.default: The activation was denied, expired, or something unforeseeable happened. Please try again.

header_device_auth_qr_instruction.default: Scan the QR code, or sign in at:

text_cookie_notice.default: Trakt uses C🍪🍪KIES in order to enhance your overall experience. You can read more information here.

error_text_locked_account.default: Your account is locked, contact support to resolve this issue.

warning_prompt_unfollow_user.default: Are you sure you want to unfollow {username}?

text_vip_upsell.default: Unlock VIP features to enhance your Trakt experience

text_vip_upsell_description.default: Want to see your month and year in review? And get access to many other features? Sign up for Trakt VIP.

warning_prompt_delete_list.default: Are you sure you want to delete the list {name}?

input_prompt_create_list.default: Enter a name for your list

list_placeholder_personal_list_empty.default: There is nothing in this list yet.

input_prompt_display_name.default: What should your display name be?

input_prompt_about.default: Tell us a bit about yourself.

text_share_list.default: Check out this "{name}" list on Trakt! 📋

text_calendar_placeholder_1.default: Nothing for you on this day. Take a day off, enjoy the weather.

text_calendar_placeholder_2.default: No items found for this date. Maybe try another day?

text_calendar_placeholder_3.default: Looks like there's nothing scheduled for this day. Relax and take it easy.

text_calendar_placeholder_4.default: Your calendar is empty on this day. Perfect time to catch up on some rest.

text_calendar_placeholder_5.default: This day is wide open. Maybe start something new?

text_calendar_placeholder_6.default: No plans here. Time to do something spontaneous.

text_calendar_placeholder_7.default: Nothing scheduled. Enjoy some free time.

text_calendar_placeholder_8.default: Your schedule is clear. Make the most of it.

text_calendar_placeholder_9.default: No events this day. Maybe revisit an old favourite.

text_calendar_placeholder_10.default: All clear. Time to explore something different.

text_cta_up_next.default: Your shows. Your pace. Jump back in exactly where you left off. What are you currently watching?

text_cta_watchlist_released.default: See it. Save it. Watch it later. Start curating your personal movie queue.

text_cta_upcoming.default: Your timeline. See what's dropping next with a full list of upcoming episodes you care about.

text_cta_watchlist_unreleased.default: Lights, camera… nothing? Add titles to your watchlist and let the binge begin.

text_cta_activity.default: Keep adding more from our team.

text_cta_personal_activity.default: Watch it. Track it. Your viewing history updates in real time, right here.

text_cta_activity_list.default: Start making friends quickly by following the Trakt Team and explore what they are watching.

warning_prompt_stop_checkin.default: Are you sure you want to stop watching {title}?

description_account_details.default: Change your photo, name and other details.

description_spoilers.default: For those who like to keep it a mystery.

description_genres.default: Add or remove your {limit} favourite genres.

description_danger_zone.default: Switch to another account or log out of the current one.

error_text_unexpected_error.default: Uh oh... this wasn't planned. If this keeps happening, please submit a new issue.

list_placeholder_no_filter_results.default: Bummer, no hits. Your filter may have been a little too selective.

error_text_unexpected_error_short.default: Uh oh... this wasn't planned. If this keeps happening, please contact Trakt support.

list_placeholder_empty.default: There is nothing in this list.

text_trakt_apps_description.default: and explore a more feature rich trakt experience on our native applications
